Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via  Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via  Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Pulaski.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forrest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forrest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Cumberland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forrest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Cumberland.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
